externalflashcompatibility: E-TTL II with EX series Speedlites, wireless multi-flash support
isosensitivity: AUTO (100-6400), 100-6400 Expandable to H (approx 12800) in 1-stop increments
exposurecompensation: +/-5 EV in 1/3 or 1/2 stop increments (can be combined with AEB)
speed: 30-1/4000 sec (1/2 or 1/3 stop increments), Bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode)
flash: Canon Speedlites (220EX, 270EX, 270EX II, 320EX, 420EX, 430EX, 430EX II, 550EX, 580EX, 580EX II, Macro-Ring-Lite, MR-14EX, Macro Twin Lite MT-24EX, Speedlite Transmitter ST-E2)
drivemodes: Single, Continuous, Self timer (2s, 10s+remote, 10s + continuous shots 2-10)
stillimagetype: JPEG: Fine, Normal (Exif 2.30 compliant) / Design rule for Camera File system (2.0)
metadatatag: User copyright information (can be set in camera)
settings: AWB, Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Tungsten, White
mirror: Quick-return half mirror (Transmission: reflection ratio of 40:60, no mirror cut-off with EF600mm f/4 or shorter)
afassistbeam: Intermittent firing of built-in flash or emitted by optional dedicated Speedlite
aelock: Auto: In 1-shot AF mode with evaluative metering exposure is locked when focus is achieved.
focallength: Equivalent to 1.6x the focal length of the lens
bodymaterials: Stainless Steel and polycarbonate resin with conductive fiber
weightbodyonly: Approx. 570g (CIPA testing standard, including battery and memory card)
imageeraseprotection: Erase: Single image, All images in folder, Checkmarked images, unprotected images
picturestyles: Auto, Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Neutral, Faithful, Monochrome, User Defined (x3)
powersaving: Power turns off after 30sec or 1, 2, 4, 8 or 15mins.
metering: Real-time evaluative metering with image sensor
depthoffieldpreview: Yes, with Depth of Field preview button
canonprinters: Canon Compact Photo Printers and PIXMA Printers supporting PictBridge
remotecontrollerswitch: Remote Switch RS-60E3, Remote Controller RC-6
afsystempoints: 9 AF points (f/5.6 cross type at centre, extra sensitivity at f/2.8)
pcmacintosh: Windows XP inc SP3 / Vista inc SP1 and SP2 (excl. Starter Edition) / 7 (excl. Starter Edition)
type: SD card, SDHC card or SDXC card
focusing: Manual Focus (Magnify the image 5x or 10x at any point on screen)
brightnessadjustment: Adjustable to one of seven levels
aflock: Locked when shutter button is pressed half way in One Shot AF mode
viewfinder: Eyecup Ef, E-series Dioptric Adjustment Lens with Rubber Frame Ef, Eyepiece Extender EP-EX15II, Angle Finder C
manualfocus: Selected on lens, default in Live View Mode
selectedafpointdisplay: Superimposed in viewfinder and indicated on LCD monitor
continuousshooting: Max. Approx. 3.7fps for approx. 34 JPEG images¹³, 6 images RAW²³
redeyereduction: Yes - with red eye reduction lamp
meteringmodes: TTL full aperture metering with 63-zone SPC
folders: New folders can be manually created and selected
slideshow: Image selection: All images, by Date, by Folder, Movies, Stills
modes: Scene Intelligent Auto, No Flash, Creative Auto, Portrait, Landscape, Close-up, Sports, Night Portrait, Movie, Program AE, Shutter priority AE, Aperture priority AE, Manual, A-DEP
viewfinderinformation: AF information: AF points, focus confirmation light
powersupplybatterychargers: AC Adapter Kit ACK-E8, Battery charger LC-E8, LC-E8E
